mil3.5.5:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.5.5:1.2_0: “Are you afraid of wrongdoing, Nāgadatta? Do you reside and wait?”
mil3.5.5:1.3_0: “Great king, I hope you’re not corrupting, Great.”
mil3.5.5:1.5_0: “Any person were to light a lamp of lamp—pointed, so that the bursting pods of lamp—what was shattered?”
mil3.5.5:1.7_0: “In the same way, great king, oil, and Saṅkassa.”
mil3.5.5:2.2_0: “Great king, do you know that you’re young, black-haired, blessed with youth, in the presence of that world?”
mil3.5.5:2.4_0: “Great king, why are you corrupted by that teacher?”
mil3.5.5:2.6_0: “In the same way, great king, oil, and Saṅkassa.”
